name: Space Bounty
description:
In this game you are controlling the blue spaceship (WASD). Its special ability is to dash (SPACE). But you are not alone. Survive the enemies that are getting tougher and tougher progressively. You are also provided with 2 turrets (LMB & RMB) to make your lives a bit easier

P.S. make sure you release W when dashing (smol bug).
